title: “Escalator” means a power driven, inclined, continuous stairway used for ascending or descending between floors or bridge over the road/railway line
clause_text: “Escalator” means a power driven, inclined, continuous stairway used for ascending or descending between floors or bridge over the road/railway line.

source_pdf.text_snippet: “Escalator” means a power driven, inclined, continuous stairway used for ascending or descending between floors or bridge over the road/railway line.
